title: ITabAndSlotGroupData.TabReverseDirection
description: Gets or sets whether to reverse the tab offset from surface value.
returns: True to reverse the tab offset from surface value, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if valid only if
ITabAndSlotGroupData::TabHeightType
is set to
swTabSlotFeatureHeightType_e
.OffsetFromSurface.
